column5: great trip the eyes look good
Great report Terry.  Nice looking pike !!!

well another year and another vacation at shiningtree I wasn't as excited as most years because I don't have an ATV anymore so it cuts back on the number of back lakes I could visit, I was going to go to one of my best lakes because the logging company was making a road close to the lake so I figured I could drive most of the way and walk in the rest well as it turned out the logging company make the road too close to some lakes, so the MNR has banned all travel along the road and it's a $5000.00 fine so they tell me if you get caught..so much for that. go to the cabin around 3 and on the water by 330 started catching walleye, looked like it was going to be a great week after dinner we went out again and couldn't buy a fish next day same thing, everyone in camp had the same complaint..no fish that night about 930 and only one walleye for the day. we started to troll back towards the camp...my buddy got a fish..we figured it was a good size pike , it stayed down and made a few good runs but as it broke the surface I saw it was a big walleye..big for that lake anyways..not Bay of Quinte big, but still big and his personal best it was bigger then the one the lodge had on the wall, that they said was 8lbs it was bigger then the picture on the counter of the one they said was weighed and was 9.9, but who knows no one could believe he let it go but were impressed by the picture... I didn't ask if I could show his picture well that was exciting but short lived as the fishing didn't pick up till late WEd. night, so there were a few days of me cursing the fishing world and asking the fishing gods what I did to offend them. the fishing did pick up and we did well after all saw Cory and Heather putting a boat in at the public ramp on the lake, they were staying at another camp that allows dogs. all in all it was a good week and I always love going there. first fish of the trip never hurts to throw in a sunset

nice looking fish! Good on you for putting the big 'eye back (although I would hope most people would, I'm kind of surprised that people would expect you to keep a fish like that). Either way, nice looking fish and good to hear the big one is still out there making babies.
Great photo's as usual Terry. Thanks for sharing
Great report and pics Terry Looks like you guys had a good time...... good mix bag of fish  Thansk for sharing Leechman
Great report Terry...thanks  Those fish look lean for the length...are they river fish???   Cheers  Craig
Nice fish you got there Terry. Good stuff
Great report and pics!!!
Some good sized fish, thanks for the report...
Glad to hear you had a good week up there Terry.  Thanks for the report and pics.  Mike
Great report Terry.  I wondered where you disappeared too!!  Love the sunset pic.  Joey
....Good stuff Terry. I haven't been up in that area for a number of years now and posts like this have me asking myself, why?
Some very nice pics there Terry. Glad you had a good week.  ps. Your bud might want to consult with his physician. He appears to have a touch of jaundice.
*spews coffee on keyboard*  Thanks!
Great report Terry, OFC would`t be complete without a Shiningtree report from you.  That was quite the walleye your bud caught also. He sure looks happy.
Some nice fish and scenery there. I can see why you go back there every year. Thanks for sharing.
Beauty of a trip Terry.  Thanks for taking us along by posting your report.
Great Report Terry, nice pickerel.. man I wish I could find them that big.  Cory and Heather stopped in on thier way home, it was good to see them again.
Hey bud welcome back and some real nice fish there bud. One question,is that a tiller yer in  Lets get back to those green fish eh.
ok when are we going ..LOL

Hi Terry,  A bad day of fishing is better then a good day at work.  I have always enjoyed the whole trip, catching lots of fish is a bonus.  We leave Sept 20th, I will let you know how we did.  Planning on using light jigs and red and white lures.  TY Doug

Great report Terry!  I can relate to slow fishing, but you got into some nice Walleye and pike!  The biggest thing I caught all weekend was a sunfish....LOL.  Great sunset picture....you sure have an eye for those great scenery pics.
Thanks for the report Terry. Great pics!
Some beauties there!
Beauty report Terry and those eyes's are huge. Congrats!!!  Cheers, 1leg
Beauty eyes and great camera work Terry.  I'll have to get up there sometime!  thanks HD
